Hi!

My name is Jaycie Say and I am a second-year student at SFU in Software Systems. Some of my interests outside of school include music, baking, and exploring the outdoors. I was a part of concert and jazz band in high school playing the drum kit and percussion. In addition, I learned how to play the piano when I was 4 years old! During midterm and final season, you can find me stress baking cookies, muffins, and scones. Finally, in the summer I love hiking and kayaking. My favorite spot to kayak is at Rocky Point in Port Moody as there are so many seals there in the summer!
